title: Problem with screen resolution
body:
Some months ago I was playing League normally, but I uninstalled it cause I didn't have time. Now I've installed it and after the champ select screen, the screen becames black and there's a message ''Non-optimum mode, put screen in 1920x1080''.

I press Alt+Enter to put the game in window mode and there I can put the game in 1920x1080 and put it in full-screen, but in that resolution there's a black line in the right side of the screen.

I'd like to play in a correct full-screen, If someone can help me I'd be very thankful!

replies.body: League doesn't currently support 4K or resolutions exceeding 1920x1080, so you could run into issues in these cases.  Your best bet would be to keep your screen at 1920x1080.  I hope that helps!
But 1600x900 don't exceed 1920x1080, does it? Why can't I play with that resolution?
